verses.name: Deuteronomy 34:4
verses.text: And the Lord said unto him, This is the land which I sware unto Abraham, unto Isaac, and unto Jacob, saying, I will give it unto thy seed: I have caused thee to see it with thine eyes, but thou shalt not go over thither.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 34:5
verses.text: So Moses the servant of the Lord died there in the land of Moab, according to the word of the Lord.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 34:6
verses.text: And he buried him in a valley in the land of Moab, over against Beth–peor: but no man knoweth of his sepulchre unto this day.
